name: DSRC Message Manager
description: Plugin that listens for TMX messages and forwards them to the DSRC Radio (i.e. the RSU).

configuration.description: The IPv4 or IPv6 address of the destination DSRC radio (i.e. the RSU).
JSON data defining the message types and PSIDs for messages forwarded to the DSRC radio on UDP Port 1.
JSON data defining the message types and PSIDs for messages forwarded to the DSRC radio on UDP Port 2.
JSON data defining the message types and PSIDs for messages forwarded to the DSRC radio on UDP Port 3.
JSON data defining the message types and PSIDs for messages forwarded to the DSRC radio on UDP Port 4.
The destination UDP port number on the DSRC radio for all messages specified by Messages_UDP_Port_1.
The destination UDP port number on the DSRC radio for all messages specified by Messages_UDP_Port_2.
The destination UDP port number on the DSRC radio for all messages specified by Messages_UDP_Port_3.
The destination UDP port number on the DSRC radio for all messages specified by Messages_UDP_Port_4.
True or False value indicating whether to sign the messages.
